name: SpookLector
description:
SpookLector is an action arcade game.

You are in an old long forgotten castle with the goal of finding lost treasures.
Ghosts will constantly come across on your way - former residents of this castle, who
still guarding their belongings. Find all the treasures and get rich!

To move, use the arrows or W,A,S,D.
To search an item, approach it and click on the item with LMB.
To scare away a ghost, get as close as possible and press LMB on it.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Random level generation.
- Lighting system.
